file_content.text: There's a whole battalion of Zakuul Knights headed your way.
They're onto our plan.
Still can't find Arcann on the security grid. He's vanished.
Me and HK will handle those Knights. Whatever it takes, get the Gravestone flying.
Be ready to run when I give the word. Don't get reckless.
No unnecessary heroics, Koth.
Me? Never. The droid? No promises.
Commentary: I am programmed for self-restraint. Usually.
Bravery in the face of certain death is only attractive when you survive. Promise you'll come back alive.
[Flirt] You're my champion.
It's more romantic if I come back almost dead.
Support: I can inflict non-lethal wounds if it will aid your courtship, masters.
A frontal assault will only get you killed. At least make them chase you somewhere, first.
Have a meaningful death.
Nice idea, but I've never been much of a sprinter.
Addendum: I do not run at all.
We'll get this done. You do the same.
Koth's military training was unorthodox, to say the least. Those Knights don't know how to defend against him and HK.
Strange. I was expecting at least a token guard of--
We have unfinished business.
You... don't... touch me!
No one is invincible. You will fall.
I just did.
You will hang on my wall for eternity.
Your father promised to help me defeat you. I'm calling him in.
Valkorion, it's showtime.
If he could stop me, he would have.
I'll do worse than that. When I'm finished, you'll beg me to kill you.
Prepare for agony.
No mercy. No surrender. As it should be.
Request: Die, meatbag!
This is still an open channel.
Docking clamps have been released. I will prepare the ship for launch.
Music to my ears!
Everybody pile in! Go!
